message: Let's split it evenly, a fair start!
I'll take a bit more, you can't blame me for trying!
You took a big chunk, now it's my turn to negotiate!
I'll compromise, but don't think I'm going to give you the whole thing!
You're getting greedy, I'll give you most of it if you're willing to meet me in the middle!
I'm not budging, you'll have to do better than that!
You're really pushing it, but I'll give you most of it if you meet me at this price!
I'm not leaving with less than 90, take it or leave it!
You're really close to getting it all, but I'll give you a little more if you're willing to meet me here!
I'm taking what's mine, you can't afford to be picky now!
You're not getting it all, I'll take what's left!
I'm not backing down, I want it all!
You're not getting it all, I'll take nothing!
